replace into ultrasrtinfo (nx, ny, baseDateTime, category, obsrValue) values
(#{items.nx}, #{items.ny}, #{items.baseDateTime}, #{items.category}, #{items.obsrValue})

replace into tb_wethr_info (xcrdnt, ycrdnt, stdr_dt, fcst_ty, fcst_ty_value) values
(#{items.nx}, #{items.ny}, #{items.fcstDateTime}, #{items.category}, #{items.fcstValue})

replace into wntyncst (stnId, tm, weatherStatusNumber, visibility, cloudAmount, cloudAmountMid, temperature , dewPointTemperature, rainfallDay, newSnowDay, snowcover, humidity, windDirection, windSpeed, sealevelPressure , tamax, tamin) values
(#{items.stnId}, DATE_FORMAT(concat(#{items.tm}, '0000'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') , IFNULL(#{items.weatherStatusNumber}, '0'), #{items.visibility}, #{items.cloudAmount}, #{items.cloudAmountMid} , #{items.temperature}, #{items.dewPointTemperature}, #{items.rainfallDay}, IFNULL(#{items.newSnowDay}, '0.00') , #{items.snowcover}, #{items.humidity}, #{items.windDirection} , #{items.windSpeed}, #{items.sealevelPressure}, #{items.tamax}, #{items.tamin})
